title: Let's Talk About IGN and Palestine - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.17.21
description:
Blessing and Tim are joined by Tamoor Hussain to talk about Games Media's support of Palestine, Starfield possibly coming in 2022 as an Xbox Exclusive, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:01:48 - Housekeeping

It’s Monday which means there’s a BUTTLOAD of new content up and available right now:

This morning: The first part of Greg and Tim’s EPIC Emily Is Away 3 Let’s Play went up on youtube.com/kindafunnygames!

Also this morning: A new Kinda Funny Podcast went live titled “Music We Can’t Listen To”

Over the weekend, our review of Star Wars The Bad Batch episode 3 went up, along with a new episode of the Kinda Funny Xcast all about the most iconic Xbox moments. You can catch everything on Youtube.com/KindaFunny, Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames, and on podcast services around the globe.

We’re streaming for the Palestine Children’s Relief Fund Friday at 11 a.m. PT. twitch.tv/kindafunnygames. You can start donating -- and learning about the charity -- now at kindaunny.com/palestine!

The Roper Report -
00:05:27 - IGN Takes Down Article And Tweet Sharing Palestinian Aid Groups
00:30:18 - Ads
00:32:55 - According to Jeff Grubb: Starfield is coming in 2022 to Xbox as a console exclusive
00:48:11 - Mario Golf got an overview trailer revealing its full Roster and Game Modes
00:50:51 - “How big do you see this game getting?” - Jordan Lee Rowan
00:53:59 - Hades has been rated for PS4 in Korea
00:54:44 - Out today
00:55:36 - You‘re Wrong
00:56:50 - Post Show
This Week’s Hosts:
Tuesday - Greg and Kahlief
Wednesday - Blessing and Andy
Thursday - Greg and Steve Saylor
Friday - Blessing and Greg

  • It’s Monday which means there’s a BUTTLOAD of new content up and available right now:
  • This morning: The first part of Greg and Tim’s EPIC Emily Is Away 3 Let’s Play went up on youtube.com/kindafunnygames!
  • Also this morning: A new Kinda Funny Podcast went live titled “Music We Can’t Listen To”
